entries.title: Publications - Banco Central de Costa Rica
entries.text: In this section you can find the documents published by the Central Bank of Costa Rica related to economic and financial reports and monetary programs.

entries.title: Reports - Banco Central de Costa Rica
entries.text: The purpose of this section is to present annual and other reports produced while carrying out the activities of the DGF.
